description: A network rule defined on a Firewall or host.

priority.description: Priority of the firewall rule. Typically, a number between 0 and 65535.

source.description: Source of the firewall rule. Can be IP address, CIDR range, 'Any', or other firewall-defined options.

sourceIp.description: Source IP of the firewall rule.

sourcePort.description: Source port of the firewall rule. Typically an integer between 0 and 65535, but could also be 'Any', '*', or range of ports.

destination.description: Destination of the firewall rule. Can be IP address, CIDR range, 'Any', or other firewall-defined options.

destinationIp.description: Destination IP of the firewall rule.

destinationPort.description: Destination port of the firewall rule. Typically an integer between 0 and 65535, but could also be 'Any', '*', or range of ports.

direction.description: The direction defined by the firewall rule, typically 'ingress' or 'egress'

action.description: The action defined by the firewall rule, typically 'Allow' or 'Deny'
